results.title: Cinderella (Disney)
results.creator_credit: Walt Disney Pictures, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske and Clyde Geronimi
results.brief_description: Walt Disney’s animated version of Charles Perrault’s classic fairy story. Featuring beautiful colour animation and a lovely musical score this version of “Cinderella” is one of the Disney studios most charming and most loved cartoon features.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Pictures, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske and Clyde Geronimi

results.title: Cinder in your eye
results.creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Phillip Mark-Law
results.brief_description: An atmospheric and poetic treatment of the restoration of railway engines accompanied by the natural sounds and music of the banjo and harmonica. Locomotives and historic rolling stock once again reign in Tasmania’s superb countryside in this journey into nostalgia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Phillip Mark-Law

results.title: Cinco anos [interactive]
results.brief_description: Interactive online work about Barcelona, containing a montage of multi-layered colourful images using hand-drawn animation, newspaper cuttings and stills to convey a sense of the local community and the use of street art.

results.title: Cincinnati automatic cycle press brake
results.brief_description: Shows the machine in action, from forming ‘flat’ sheets of metal on high speed or bending metal perfectly on slow speed. The machine has been revolutionary for workers helping them get the job done faster.
results.description: Shows the machine in action, from forming ‘flat’ sheets of metal on high speed or bending metal perfectly on slow speed. The machine has been revolutionary for workers helping them get the job done faster.

results.title: Ciliated thought
results.brief_description:
This project is based upon an exploration of themes and imagery from the novel “Bend Sinister” by Vladimir Nabokov.
Fragments from a story about love and loss…among other things.

results.title: Cigarettes and matches
results.creator_credit: Jerry Elder Productions and Jerry Elder
results.brief_description: Based on a chapter from the book “The Sun on the Stubble” by Colin Thiele. Evokes the Australian country and the people of the 1920’s by highlighting the relationships between members of a farming family and their friends. Cast includes Michael Moody, Timothy Edwards, Hetty Rollings, John Remynse. Suitable for primary and lower secondary levels.

results.title: Cigarette smoking
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”.
This film shows the increase in cigarette smoking in the United States of America since World War I and how this increase has led to a large jump in the incidence of lung cancer. It also shows other diseases directly attributed to cigarette smoking.

results.title: Cigarette blues
results.creator_credit: Dallas Museum of Art, Flower Films, Les Blank and Alan B. Govenar
results.brief_description: As Texas blues singer Sonny Rhodes performs a song about a lover who died from smoking cigarettes, the film shows a sculpture made entirely of butts from the cigarettes which eventually killed the sculptor, Louis Bunce.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dallas Museum of Art, Flower Films, Les Blank and Alan B. Govenar
